name: Login with email containing spaces
description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with an email address containing spaces.
steps: Step 1: Enter an email address with spaces in the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter a password in the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: An error message should be displayed indicating an invalid email format.

elements.description: Username or email address input field
